children.text: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

children.placeholderText:
{{

test_type.selectedOptionValue === "custom_sql" ? "Example:\n\nSELECT\n  id,\n  field1,\n  field2,\n  'table_A' as primary_table,\n  'id' as primary_table_id_field\nFROM\n table_A\nWHERE\n  field1 > 1000" : 

test_type.selectedOptionValue === 
"accepted_values" ? "Example:\n\nvalues: ['oral mini-pill (progestogen)', 'male condom', 'female sterilization', 'iud', 'oral combination pill', 'implants', 'injectible']": 

test_type.selectedOptionValue === 
"possible_duplicate_forms" ? "Example:\n\ntable_specific_patient_uuid: patient_id| table_specific_uuid: uuid| table_specific_period: day": 

test_type.selectedOptionValue === 
"expression_is_true" ? "Example:\n\nname: \"t_under_24_months_wrong_dosage\"| expression: \"malaria_act_dosage is not null\"| condition: \"(patient_age_in_months<24) and (malaria_give_act is not null)\"": 

test_type.selectedOptionValue === 
"expect_similar_means_across_reporters" ? "Example:\n\n{\"key\": \"reported_by\",\"quantity\": \"child_temperature_pre_chw\",\"form_name\": \"dot_model__iccmview_assessment\",\"id_column\": \"reported_by\"}": 

test_type.selectedOptionValue === 
"relationships" ? "Example:\n\nname: missed_anc_visit_followup| to: ref('dot_model__ancview_pregnancy_visit')| field: pregnancy_uuid": ""

}}
children.validation:
{{

test_type.selectedOptionValue === "custom_sql" & test_parameters.text.match(/\w/) ? true : 

test_type.selectedOptionValue === 
"accepted_values" & test_parameters.text.match(/^values:\s?\[.*\]/) ? true : 

test_type.selectedOptionValue === 
"possible_duplicate_forms" & test_parameters.text.match(/table_specific_.*?:.*?\|\s?table_specific_.*?:.*?\|\s?table_specific_period:/) ? true : 

test_type.selectedOptionValue === 
"expression_is_true" & test_parameters.text.match(/^name:\s?".*?"\|\s?expression:\s?".*?"\|\s?condition:\s?"/)? true : 

test_type.selectedOptionValue === 
"expect_similar_means_across_reporters" & test_parameters.text.match(/^\{"key":\s?".*?",".*?":\s?".*?","form_name":\s?".*?","id_column":\s?".*?"\}/) ? true : 

test_type.selectedOptionValue === 
"relationships" & test_parameters.text.match(/^name:.*?\|\s?to:\s?ref\(.*?\)\|\s?field:/) ? true : false

}}
children.isRequired:
{{

test_type.selectedOptionValue === "custom_sql"  ? true : 

test_type.selectedOptionValue === 
"accepted_values" ? true : 

test_type.selectedOptionValue === 
"possible_duplicate_forms"  ? true : 

test_type.selectedOptionValue === 
"expression_is_true" ? true : 

test_type.selectedOptionValue === 
"expect_similar_means_across_reporters"  ? true : 

test_type.selectedOptionValue === 
"relationships"  ? true : false

}}

actionConfiguration.body:
DELETE FROM dot."configured_tests"
  WHERE "test_id" = {{configured_tests.triggeredRow.test_id}};

DELETE FROM dot."configured_tests"
  WHERE "test_id" = {{configured_tests.triggeredRow.test_id}};

SELECT 
  ct.*,
  ce.entity_name
FROM 
  dot."configured_tests" ct,
  dot."configured_entities" ce
where 
  ce.entity_id = ct.entity_id
AND "description" ilike '%{{configured_tests.searchText || ""}}%'
ORDER BY "{{col_select.selectedOptionValue}}" {{order_select.selectedOptionValue}}
LIMIT {{configured_tests.pageSize}}
OFFSET {{(configured_tests.pageNo - 1) * configured_tests.pageSize}};

SELECT 
  ct.*,
  ce.entity_name
FROM 
  dot."configured_tests" ct,
  dot."configured_entities" ce
where 
  ce.entity_id = ct.entity_id
AND "description" ilike '%{{configured_tests.searchText || ""}}%'
ORDER BY "{{col_select.selectedOptionValue}}" {{order_select.selectedOptionValue}}
LIMIT {{configured_tests.pageSize}}
OFFSET {{(configured_tests.pageNo - 1) * configured_tests.pageSize}};

UPDATE dot."configured_tests" SET
    "test_activated" = {{test_activated.isChecked}},
		"project_id" = '{{project_id.selectedOptionValue}}',
		"scenario_id" = '{{scenario_id.selectedOptionValue}}',
		"priority" = {{priority.selectedOptionValue}},
		"description" = '{{description.text}}',
		"impact" = '{{impact.text}}',
		"proposed_remediation" = '{{proposed_remediation.text}}',
		"entity_id" = '{{entity_id.selectedOptionValue}}',
		"test_type" = '{{test_type.selectedOptionValue}}',
		"column_name" = '{{column_name.text}}',
		"test_parameters" = '{{test_parameters.text}}'
  WHERE "test_id" = {{configured_tests.selectedRow.test_id}};

UPDATE dot."configured_tests" SET
    "test_activated" = {{test_activated.isChecked}},
		"project_id" = '{{project_id.selectedOptionValue}}',
		"scenario_id" = '{{scenario_id.selectedOptionValue}}',
		"priority" = {{priority.selectedOptionValue}},
		"description" = '{{description.text}}',
		"impact" = '{{impact.text}}',
		"proposed_remediation" = '{{proposed_remediation.text}}',
		"entity_id" = '{{entity_id.selectedOptionValue}}',
		"test_type" = '{{test_type.selectedOptionValue}}',
		"column_name" = '{{column_name.text}}',
		"test_parameters" = '{{test_parameters.text}}'
  WHERE "test_id" = {{configured_tests.selectedRow.test_id}};

INSERT INTO dot."configured_tests" (
	"test_id",
	"description", 
	"test_activated",
	"project_id", 
	"scenario_id"
)
VALUES (
				{{insert_col_input1.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input2.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input3.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input4.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input5.text}}
);

INSERT INTO dot."configured_tests" (
	"test_id",
	"description", 
	"test_activated",
	"project_id", 
	"scenario_id"
)
VALUES (
				{{insert_col_input1.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input2.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input3.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input4.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input5.text}}
);
select project_id as "label", project_id as "value" from dot.projects;
select project_id as "label", project_id as "value" from dot.projects;
select CONCAT(cause_sub_category, ' - ', scenario) as "label", scenario_id as "value" from dot.scenarios;
select scenario_id as "label", scenario_id as "value" from dot.scenarios;
select entity_name as "label", entity_id as "value" from dot.configured_entities;
select entity_name as "label", entity_id as "value" from dot.configured_entities;
select test_type as "label", test_type as "value" from dot.test_types ORDER by test_type;
select test_type as "label", test_type as "value" from dot.test_types ORDER by test_type;

SELECT 
    isc.column_name as "label",
		isc.column_name as "value"
FROM 
    INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS isc,
    dot.configured_entities ce
where
    ce.entity_name = isc.table_name 
    and ce.entity_id = '{{entity_id.selectedOptionLabel}}'
order by column_name;

unpublishedAction.name: bulkUpdate

actionConfiguration.body: () => !!configured_tests.selectedRows.length
UPDATE dot.configured_tests SET test_activated = {{this.params.test_activated_bulk}} WHERE test_id in {{ this.params.test_ids }};

unpublishedCollection.name: JSUpdate
